application.job_application_age_question: Are you 18 years of age or older?
application.job_application_eligibility_to_work_us_q: If hired, can you provide proof of eligibility to work in the United States?
application.job_application_driver_license_question: Do you have a valid driver's license?
application.job_application_auto_insurance_question: Do you have a valid auto insurance?
application.job_application_archdiocese_policy_descr: The Archdiocese recruits, hires and promotes on the basis of merit, competence and qualifications, without being influenced by race, color, national origin, ancestry, physical disability, mental disability, medical condition, marital status, sex, age, pregnancy, or veteran status. The Archdiocese reserves the right to be the sole judge of merit, competence and qualifications and can favor Catholic applicants in all employment decisions based on religious preferences and other religious needs, criteria and policies.
